subject: Rajasthan History
question_en: Which districts were included in the formation of the Rajasthan state?
question_hi: राजस्थान की संरक्षण में केन्द्रधारा को कैसे सूचना कीती जाती है।
A_en: Jaipur, Jodhpur, Udaipur, Alwar, Bharatpur, Bikaner, Sikar, Dausa, Banswara, Kota
A_hi: जयपुर, जोधपुर, उदयपुर, आलवार, बहरतपुर, बिकानेर, सिकार, डॉसा, बांसवारा, कोटा
B_en: Which of the following districts was added to Rajasthan after it was formed?

explanation_en: After the merger of Jodhpur, Alwar, Kota, Banswara, Dausa, and parts of Sawai Khera district into Rajasthan, Jodhpur, Alwar, Kota, Banswara, Dausa, and parts of Sawai Khera district added to Rajasthan.

question_en: What districts were merged with Rajasthan to form a new state?
question_hi: जमाे एक जमाे एक जमाे एक जमाे एक

C_en: Which districts were merged with Rajasthan to form a state?

D_hi: जमाे एक जमाे एक जमाे एक
E_en: Which region was merged with Rajasthan?
explanation_en: After the merger of Jodhpur, Alwar, Kota, Banswara, Dausa, and parts of Sawai Khera district came together to form Rajasthan.
